Name: oprnamespace
column6: the oid of the namespace that contains this operator

Name: oprkind
column6: b = infix ("both"), l = prefix ("left"), r = postfix ("right")

Name: oprcom
column6: commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
column6: negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprrest
column6: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprjoin
column6: join selectivity estimation function for this operator
